Html:
Hi

I given a setup to install application to another computer which contains following dependency files:

Packaging file 'AvalonDock.dll'...

Packaging file 'Microsoft.MapPoint.Data.VirtualEarthTileDataSource.dll'

after installation if use open map form then i can see some of the pushpin for 2 sec. & then give error. so i installed Bing Maps 3D to that computer. After installing the same, now when am opening a form then i can see some of the pushpin for 2 sec. then map disappear. even not firing any error.

plz. anybody can help me.

Thanks in advance.
